cevodata 1.0.0

    cevodata construction Filter or split cevodata Statistics

    Function reference

    Init cevodata

    init_cevodata()
    Create new cevomod dataset object

    Basic setters and getters

    add_metadata()
    Add metadata to the cevodata object
    add_SNV_data() add_CNA_data() add_stats() add_models() SNVs() CNAs() get_models() get_model_names() get_stats() get_CNAs_var_names() get_SNVs_wider()
    Get/Add SNV/CNA data from the cevodata dataset
    add_data() add_to_cevodata()
    readthis integration
    SNVs_CNAs()
    Get SNVs with merged CNAs
    get_metadata()
    Get sample metadata
    get_patients_data()
    Get metadata cols that are constant within each patient

    Transformations

    filter(<cevodata>)
    Filter/subset cevodata object
    split_by()
    Split object
    merge(<cevodata>)
    Merge two cevodata objects

    More stats

    calc_Mf_1f() get_Mf_1f() plot_Mf_1f()
    William's M(f) ~ 1/f statistics
    calc_mutation_frequencies() dentro_2015_correction()
    Calc mutation frequencies
    calc_cumulative_tails() get_cumulative_tails() plot_cumulative_tails()
    Cumulative tails
    calc_all_sample_stats() calc_all_patient_stats() calc_sample_sample_stats()
    Calc extra sample/patient stats
    calc_SFS() get_SFS() plot_SFS()
    Site Frequency Spectra
    plot(<cevo_Mf_1f_tbl>)
    Plot M(f) ~ 1/f
    plot(<cevo_SFS_tbl>)
    Plot SFS
    plot(<cevo_cumulative_tails_tbl>)
    Plot the cumulative tails

    Data

    driver_genes
    Tbl of driver genes from Bailey, Ding et al. 'Comprehensive Characterization of Cancer Driver Genes and Mutations', Cell, 2-18 https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cell.2018.02.060
    tcga_brca_test
    Small TCGA BRCA cevodata dataset
    test_data
    4 test samples

    Other functions

    annotate_normal_cn()
    Annotate chromosome ploidies in CNA data
    as_cevo_snvs()
    Create cevo_snvs tibble
    filter_SNVs_by_regions()
    Filter SNVs by position: using regions tbl or bed file
    intervalize_mutation_frequencies()
    Intervalize the mutation frequencies
    join_metadata()
    Join object metadata to a tibble
    quick_load() quick_save()
    Quick save to ~/.cevomod directory
    set_snvs_frequency_measure() get_snvs_frequency_measure()
    Set/Get SNVs frequency measure
    default_SNVs() `default_SNVs<-`() default_CNAs() `default_CNAs<-`() active_models() `active_models<-`()
    Get/Set active assays of the cevodata object
    unite_mutation_id()
    Unite many columns to create mutation_id column
    update(<cevodata>)
    Update cevodata object with values from another object
    update_cevodata_v2_to_v3()
    Update to cevodata to v3
    use_purity()
    Choose purity measure
    `%not in%`
    Not in operator

    External integrations

    export_to_clip()
    Export cevodata to CliP input
